channel.title: How do i change my stats!
channel.description: [glow=red,2,300]On my game i am owner with rights as 3 but i dont know how to change my stats so when i let other people go on i am at the highest lvl cos i changed max stat lvl to 200 plz help :confused:[/glow]

item.title: How do i change my stats!
item.dc:creator: @klomp3 klomp3
item.description:
@klomp3 wrote:

[code]go to clien.jave,
search for “master” i will say like

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) addSkillXP(14910000, 0); addSkillXP(14910000, 1); addSkillXP(14910000, 2); addSkillXP(14910000, 3); addSkillXP(14910000, 4); addSkillXP(14910000, 5); addSkillXP(14910000, 6); addSkillXP(14910000, 7); addSkillXP(14910000, 8); addSkillXP(14910000, 9); addSkillXP(14910000, 10); addSkillXP(14910000, 11); addSkillXP(14910000, 12); addSkillXP(14910000, 13); addSkillXP(14910000, 14); addSkillXP(14910000, 15); addSkillXP(14910000, 16); addSkillXP(14910000, 17); addSkillXP(14910000, 18); addSkillXP(14910000, 19); addSkillXP(14910000, 20); addSkillXP(14910000, 21); addSkillXP(14910000, 22); addSkillXP(14910000, 23); sendMessage("You're now maxed out in all skills... Go own some pleekayers."); }

now change this addSkillXP(14910000, 0);
to addSkillXP(1491000000000, 0);

then ur done, save, compile, restart, try and voila[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change my stats!

item.title: How do i change my stats!
item.dc:creator: @I_CREEATE I CREEATE
item.description:
@I_CREEATE wrote:

it can be mostly .
::pure
::master. idk about being stat 200 but i kno these will max all your stats to 99.
(::pure) makes everything 99 except prayer and def

item.title: How do i change my stats!
item.dc:creator: @billysmither billysmither
item.description:
@billysmither wrote:

Usally type one of these

::maxall
::maxout
::master

if not you will have to make a command to give you maxed out stats
